sentence.Network_en: Would you mind awfully waiting a bit, I'll be back right away.
sentence.Network_cn: 不介意稍微等一会儿吧，我马上就回来。
黄油奶糖看上去非常好吃。

奥芙莉（Awfully Chocolate）的主打产品还要说是蛋糕。黑巧克力原味蛋糕、朗姆酒樱桃巧克力蛋糕、巧克力香蕉蛋糕，巧克力味道 …
闯过一关又一关的难关，奥芙莉巧克力（Awfully Chocolate）如今越战越勇，在饮食界闯出一个名堂来。不强调包装，只注重内在是 …
1、看上去。 You look great.你看上去气色很好。 You look awfully nervous.你看上去很紧张。 All of my clothes look so old and I can't afford.
方式副词_英语网 ... a. fairly simple 相当简单 awfully sorry 非常抱歉 quite correct 完全正确.

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is awful, you dislike that person or thing or you think that they are not very good.

example.ex: We met and I thought he was awful...
example.tran: 我们见了面，我觉得他很讨人厌。

example.ex: I couldn't stand London! Bloody awful place.
example.tran: 我在伦敦再也呆不下去了！简直是个糟糕至极的地方。

entry.tran: 使人不愉快的；令人震惊的；可怕的；极坏的
entry.def: If you say that something is awful, you mean that it is extremely unpleasant, shocking, or bad.

example.ex: Her injuries were massive. It was awful...
Some of their offences are so awful they would chill the blood.
example.tran: 他们的一些罪行骇人听闻，简直令人毛骨悚然。

entry.def: If you look or feel awful, you look or feel ill.

example.ex: I hardly slept at all and felt pretty awful...
example.tran: 我基本上没睡，觉得很难受。

example.ex: I looked awful and felt quite shaky.
example.tran: 我貌似生病了，觉得很虚弱。

entry.def: You can use awful with noun groups that refer to an amount in order to emphasize how large that amount is.

example.ex: I've got an awful lot of work to do.

entry.tran: （与表示特征的形容词连用，用于强调）极度地，非常
entry.def: You can use awful with adjectives that describe a quality in order to emphasize that particular quality.

example.ex: You know, 10 years sounds like an awful long time.
example.tran: 你知道，10年听起来遥遥无期。

sentences.sentence: "there was a dreadfully bloody accident on the road this morning"

auth_sentence.content: I certainly am awfully glad to see you again.
auth_sentence.res_content: I certainly am awfully glad to see you again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I certainly am awfully glad to see you again.

auth_sentence.content: I'm awfully afraid he has given up hope.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm awfully afraid he has given up hope.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm awfully afraid he has given up hope.

auth_sentence.content: But there's an awfully good reason to want one.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there's an awfully good reason to want one.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there's an awfully good reason to want one.

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately,many American universities seem awfully busy protecting their brand name and not nearly busy enough protecting the pursuit of knowledge.
But I am not awfully happy with the idea.

sentences.en: You look awfully pale,are you all right?
sentences.cn: 你面色很苍白,身体怎么了?

sentences.en: And then he was awfully decent about giving me this job.
sentences.cn: 当时他特别宽厚,将这件工作交给了我。
